name: xschu Article Extraction with Content Selector
description: Example task demonstrating content_selector for improved Stage 1 cleaning and stage2_fallback for better JSON extraction
_comment: DeepSeek LLM Configuration - Use provider='openai' for standard OpenAI-compatible API. The system will add 'deepseek/' prefix to the model name automatically.
prompt_template:
Extract the following information from the article:
- title: The article title
- content: The main article content
- publish_date: When the article was published
- author: The author name if available

Return as valid JSON.
